text: California has a personal belief exemption to any new vaccine added to the schedule after June 2015 for public and private daycare, preschool and K-12.
entity_strings: California, June 2015, K-12, daycare, personal belief, preschool, vaccine
entities: ['California', ' June 2015', ' K-12', ' daycare', ' personal belief', ' preschool', ' vaccine']

text: It used to be that the only children at school who weren't vaccinated were those who had true medical conditions. Now there are 19 states that allow personal belief exemptions.
